headline: Show HN: ZORP – Native Android and iOS app builder for internal teams
description:
Hey HN, founder here. Zorp is a no-code/low-code platform to build native android and iOS apps for internal teams. It is workflow-based as opposed to CRUD since most mobile app use cases are process-oriented.

Few highlights, - Mobile UI can be built using a WYSIWYG interface - Integrate with any external system via REST APIs (We're adding more integrations soon) - Built-in database - Fully managed RBAC, Users and Teams - Javascript extensible

Typically, internal mobile apps are built from scratch, which leads to a huge waste of developer bandwidth, or people manage with spreadsheets, forms, etc. We aim to enable ppl to build fully scalable native applications without much development effort.

To get started, you can visit https://zorp.one and sign up. We've temporarily removed mandatory email validation to help you sign up easily.

We're here if you have any questions/suggestions/comments.
